title: Ghana Bans Bleaching Creams But Enforces Little as Clinics Fill Up
desc: Ghana has had legislation restricting the sale of skin bleaching products containing mercury, hydroquinone, and potent corticosteroids for years, yet dermatology clinics across the country are filling with patients suffering complications that experts say are entirely preventable, raising urgent questions about the gap between the law and its enforcement. title: Dad Dying at 56 Before He Could Retire Changed How I Live Now; Plan
desc: My dad died young at 56 and never got to retire. The lessons he taught me changed my views on retirement and how I'm planning for my financial future.
